alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Carroll; Frederick; Howard; Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 2:18PM EDT until April 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...HOWARD AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...SOUTHEASTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND... At 218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green Valley, or near Damascus, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Rockville, Olney, Pikesville, Westminster, Damascus, Historic Ellicott City, Ellicott City, Aspen Hill, North Bethesda, Woodlawn, Randallstown, Montgomery Village, Owings Mills, Eldersburg, Milford Mill, Reisterstown, Lochearn, White Oak and Redland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
